C

c - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Briefcase
This field assigns the briefcase's row coordinate.
canSeeBriefcase - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
This field represents the state of the briefcase and if it is visible to the user, it's true, and it can be changed through UserInterface.canSeeBriefcase.
canStab - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This field represents the enemy's ability to stab the player, which depends on whether the player is in an adjacent square.
changeDebug() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.UserInterface
this method toggles the value of UserInterface.isDebugMode, which affects the darkness's display.
checkDirection(int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This method takes a given integer input for the direction, and subsequently sends the information to adjustTemps(int, int) to change the "temporary" fields previousRow, previousCol, possibleRow, and possibleCol.
checkItemPlayerPositions(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method uses integers nextPlayerRow and nextPlayerCol to check if a player is coming up to an item, and if the player is, then Map.isItem is set to true.
checkItemPosition(boolean, int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
This method checks the position of items and the player.
checkItems(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method checks to see if GameEngine.theSpy will step on GameEngine.theItem.
checkPlayer(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This method checks all four directly adjacent squares for the player and changes Enemy.canStab to true if the player is indeed in one of the adjacent squares.
colArray - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Briefcase
This field represents the briefcase's possible column coordinates.
colIdx - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Briefcase
This field randomly selects 0, 1, 2, which represent the integers 1, 4, and 7 in the array Briefcase.colArray.
colPosition - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This field represents the position in the column of the object, which will eventually be used for interactions (killing, moving) and for the map.
createMap() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method uses Map.emptyPositions() and Map.createRooms() to create the map.
createMoveLocation() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
This method randomly selects the enemy's direction and sends it as the argument to checkDirection(int).
createNewGame() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method creates a new instance of the game.
createRooms() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method uses Map.position to create rooms (denoted by the integer 1) in the desired spaces: with the rows and columns being the combinations of 1, 4, and 7.
